heading: Learn to Code with Codemy.net membership!
slogan: Learn to code by watching our 'Code Along' video series that show you how without skipping any steps.

content.question: What is a 'Code Along'
content.answer: Code Along is a method of learning to code by watching the example on the screen and following along. Coding along allows you to actually experience programming even without having prior experience.

content.question: How can I learn if I'm just following along?
content.answer: You'll need to make the effort to understand the code being written, this is something we leave up to you. We don't recommend blindly copying the code on the screen but actively asking questions in your head like 'How does it all fit together?' or 'If i change this part I wonder what happens?'

content.question: How Often do you release new content?
content.answer: We aim to release new content every week. There will always be new member exclusive content, some weeks we may not release any publically available videos.

content.question: What kind of content does Codemy.net Cover?
content.answer: Codemy.net primarily focuses on Web Application Development. This means we cover everything from Development Tooling to Front-end Development to Back-End Development.

content.question: How long does it take me to learn to code?
content.answer: Everyone goes at a different pace. It really depends on how committed and active you are. If you watch the videos follow along and ask questions on our forum chances are you'll learn faster.

content.question: Can I cancel my membership?
content.answer: Of course you can. You are able to cancel your membership in the Settings Â» Subscription page without having to contact support at any time. We leave the control in your hands.
